sentences.en: Are you sure this is the right place to recruit for a militia?
sentences.cn: 你确定这是合适的地方去找民兵 吗 ?

sentences.en: At arrival You can only recruit and train mercenaries.
sentences.cn: 到达你只能招募和训练雇佣军.

sentences.en: Drill sergeants have eight weeks to turn fresh recruits into soldiers.
sentences.cn: 操练军士要在八个星期之内把新兵训练成真正的士兵。

sentences.en: Firms are now keen to hold on to the people they recruit.
sentences.cn: 各公司现在都急切地想要留住招聘来的员工。

sentences.en: He came to the seaside to recruit.
sentences.cn: 他来到海滨休养.

sentences.en: He helped to recruit volunteers to go to Pakistan to fight.
sentences.cn: 他协助招募志愿者到巴基斯坦打仗。

sentences.en: Including this recruit, I found my strength to amount to about $ 400.
sentences.cn: 这笔赔偿的款子也算在内, 我看我的财力差不多有四百美元.

sentences.en: Many government officials were recruited from private industry.
sentences.cn: 很多政府官员是从私营企业招募来的。

sentences.en: Most of the men in the village were recruited that day.
sentences.cn: 村里的大多数男子在那一天应征入伍。

sentences.en: New recruits are sent to the Atlanta office for training.
sentences.cn: 新成员被送到亚特兰大办事处接受培训。

sentences.en: Q : How many graduates will HASL recruit this year?
sentences.cn: HASL会今年会招聘多少应届毕业生?

sentences.en: Recruit, train and develop the sales force for maximum efficiency and effectiveness.
sentences.cn: 招聘 、 培训和发展销售队伍,提高销售团队的工作效率.

sentences.en: The recruit made the current circulate in the circuit on the circumference.
sentences.cn: 新兵使电流在周长上在电路内循环.

sentences.en: The school authority decided to recruit teachers from the excellent graduates.
sentences.cn: 校方决定从优秀毕业生中招聘老师.

sentences.en: They come to the square to recruit for the Navy every Sunday.
sentences.cn: 他们每周日到广场来招收海军新兵.

sentences.en: They need to recruit more people into the prison service. But another point I'd like to make is that many prisons were built in the nineteenth century.
sentences.cn: 监狱需要招募更多的工作人员。但我想补充一点，很多监狱都是在19世纪建造的。

sentences.en: This is a nationwide campaign to recruit women into trade unions.
sentences.cn: 这是一次吸收妇女参加工会的全国性运动.

sentences.en: We have launched a campaign to recruit 10,000 skilled workers.
sentences.cn: 我们已经发起了一场招募10,000技术工人的招聘.

sentences.en: We lower the standards in order to recruit real talents.
sentences.cn: 我们降低标准是为了招纳真正的人才。

sentences.en: We’re having difficulty recruiting enough qualified staff.
sentences.cn: 我们难以招聘到足够的合格职员。
